Solution"}]},{"type":"text","value":":"}]},{"type":"element","tag":"code","props":{"className":["language-js"],"code":"function MovingMedian(arr) { \r\n  let subArr = [],\r\n    midpoint = 0,\r\n    predecessors = arr[0] - 1;\r\n\r\n  let nums = arr.slice(1);\r\n  nums = nums.map((num, i) => {\r\n    if (i == 0) return num;\r\n\r\n    // get the range of arr elements for moving window\r\n    if (i <= predecessors) {\r\n      subArr = nums.slice(0, i+1).sort((a,b) => a - b);\r\n    } else {\r\n      subArr = nums.slice(i - predecessors, i+1).sort((a,b) => a - b);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // get midpoint\r\n    midpoint = Math.floor(subArr.length / 2);\r\n    \r\n    // calculate the median for each range / subarray\r\n    return subArr.length % 2 ?\r\n      subArr[midpoint] :\r\n      (subArr[midpoint] + subArr[midpoint - 1]) / 2;\r\n  });\r\n\r\n  // return median list as string\r\n  return nums.join(\",\"); \r\n}\n","language":"js","meta":""},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"pre","props":{},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"code","props":{"__ignoreMap":""},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"span","props":{"class":"line","line":1},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"span","props":{"class":"ct-422695"},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"function"}]},{"type":"element","tag":"span","props":{"class":"ct-212021"},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"
